title: Experiencing 130~ ping consistently
body: So pretty much title. I usually have around 28-32 ping but since Saturday, I have 130 ping constantly. I would get brief moments where I would have my normal ping. It is very frustrating to play. Any help?

replies.body:
A lot of our players, especially those on Verizon, have been having these ping spikes due to major ISP outages and EU ISP issues here and there. We're doing our best to get the word out, but it can be rather hard to troubleshoot ping spikes when your own ISP is having routing problems. 

Run a traceroute to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) so I can get an idea of what your connection looks like after it leaves your network. This should give me a good idea of what's going on and what kind of solutions may help.
Same here, in northern VA getting 130ish ping, used be 30-32 at all times.

same here, I live in East, Virginia and use Fios internet 100/100, did all the ping test, came out all good. ping averages 130-133 in game. unplayable. I guess its only in east coast because others who were playing says they're fine
I live in Va as well. I use Verizon
I would submit a ticket.  I have the same issue and im on the east coast.  Submit a ticket to raise awareness so they fix it faster.  Started yesterday.  Unplayable.

All four major internet companies such as Comcast, Verizon, AT&T, and Spectrum are having major outages. I'm not really sure why but this is probably a factor relating to why we're seeing consistent ping at 143ms. I'd say MAYBE it was due to the snow storm we had but it wasn't that bad of a storm from what I personally witnessed.
I know of another player having the exact same problem, they have lost a placement game due to unplayable ping caused by the game.
Yeah, it was me. I have the same exact issue. I'm not sure why but for me its at a consistent 142ms. I ran ping tests already and I'm about to submit a ticket. I'll let you know if I figure it out.
